import resetColors from"../resetColors";function getRandomInt(max){return Math.floor(Math.random()*Math.floor(max));}export default function loadRGrid(grid){//reset colors of grid
resetColors(grid.length,grid[0].length);var nodes=grid;for(var row=0;row<grid.length;row++){for(var col=0;col<grid[0].length;col++){nodes[row][col]=getRandomInt(10);}}return grid;}
